name: containerized-app
description: Project create as a register of docker studies
author: Dimas Prates

:pencil2: style.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

:recycle: refactor.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

:zap: perf.description: A code change that improves performance

:test_tube: test.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests

:package: build.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)

:bricks: ci.description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)

:wrench: chore.description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
